texts.list: 1991 - 1993 - Vitra Fire Station in Weil am Rhein, Germany
1997 – 2000 - Contemporary Arts Center, United States of America.
1998 – 2010 - National Museum of Arts of the 21st Century (MAXXI), Rome, Italy.
2007 - 2012 - Broad Art Museum, Michigan State University, East Lansing, Michigan, USA.

title: Zaha Hadid
titleDescription: The first woman to receive the Pritzker Architecture Prize
textImage: The picture depict the random image hover effect
footer: If you have time, you should read more about this incredible human being on her website
pictureDescriptionGreen: of magnificient masterpiece of architectural buildings
paragraph: Her international reputation was greatly enhanced in 1988 when she was chosen to show her drawings and paintings  as one of seven architects chosen to participate in the exhibition Deconstructivism in Architecture curated by Philip  Johnson and Mark Wigley at New York's Museum of Modern Art.
